EmailTemplate.name: Building Big Data Applications with Hadoop & Spring.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for the Building Big Data Applications with Hadoop & Spring Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Building Big Data Applications with Hadoop & Spring We're glad you can join us.
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to you joining us for our third installment in the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series.
Event Details:
Date: Thursday, October 3, 2013
Time: 9AM PST/ 5PM GMT Summer Time
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=669907789>
Event Number: 669 907 789
Dial In:
- US TOLL FREE: +1-855-749-4750 - US TOLL: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 669 907 789
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:marketing@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
